AbstractText.sentence: The regulation of gene expression during lymphocyte differentiation is a complex process involving interactions between multiple positive and negative transcriptional regulatory elements.

event.clue: The regulation of gene expression during lymphocyte differentiation is a complex process involving interactions between multiple positive and negative transcriptional regulatory elements.

AbstractText.sentence: In this article, transcriptional regulation of the archetypal T-cell-specific gene, alpha TCR, is discussed.

event.clue: In this article, transcriptional regulation of the archetypal T-cell-specific gene, alpha TCR, is discussed.

AbstractText.sentence: Major recent developments, including the identification of novel families of transcription factors that regulate multiple T-cell genes during thymocyte ontogeny and T-cell activation, are described.

event.clue: Major recent developments, including the identification of novel families of transcription factors that regulate multiple T-cell genes during thymocyte ontogeny and T-cell activation, are described.
